site_name: Development Site 13 To 14 Berners Mews And
description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 29 August 2017 (RN:17/05791/FULL) for, 'Erection of mansard roof extension at sixth floor level and installation of roof plant and lift overrun above, partial infilling of existing northern light well on first to fifth floors and partial infilling of southern light well on fifth and sixth floor levels and alterations to existing elevations, including replacement windows and associated works'; NAMELY, to make the following amendments to the approved development: (i) Reconfigure of the new ventilation and air conditioning units and associated screening at roof level; (ii) Retain lightwell to Newman Street elevation and make associated design changes at ground floor level; (iii) Detailed design changes at ground floor level on Berners Mews elevation; and (iv) Retain lightwell windows.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
